content.question: Which of the following pieces of evidence mentioned by Ogilvie best supports her claim that Württemberg's institutions prevented women from playing a leading role in the Commercial Revolution there?

choices.label: The retention of occupational guild control over exports
The power of local community institutions over social issues such as marriage
The authority of church courts and citizen’s assemblies to regulate work and consumption
The similarities between Württemberg and England and the Low Countries

content.answer: The authority of church courts and citizen’s assemblies to regulate work and consumption

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
